ariaExpanded.description: The value for setting aria-expanded attribute.
ariaExpanded.name: ariaExpanded

ariaHasPopup.description: The value for setting aria-haspopup attribute.
ariaHasPopup.name: ariaHasPopup

ariaLabel.description: The value for setting aria-label attribute.
ariaLabel.name: ariaLabel

children.description: The content to be shown in the button.
children.name: children

class.description: Style class to be set on the root element.
class.name: class

disabled.description: Whether or not the button is disabled.
disabled.name: disabled

href.description: The URL that the link button points to.
href.name: href

style.description: Inline styles for the button component.
style.name: style

target.description:
Where to display the linked `href` URL for a link button. For example
pass `_blank` to open the link in a new tab.
target.name: target

type.description:
Specifies the type of the button, mainly for controlling forms. Setting
this to `submit` will submit the containing form; `reset` will reset the
form.
type.name: type

onAction.description:
Specifies the callback to call when an action is performed on the button. This
is either a pointer interaction like a click or keyboard interaction like pressing
Enter or Space.
onAction.name: onAction

tags.param: event The event object of the event that triggered the onAction
